name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a highly skilled Senior iOS Developer with 8+ years of experience in software engineering, I excel in building robust and user-friendly applications, leveraging a deep expertise in **Swift**, **SwiftUI**, **UIKit**, and asynchronous programming with **GCD** and **Operation Queues**. My proficiency in integrating **REST APIs**, **WebSockets**, and utilizing **Core Data** for data persistence ensures seamless functionality and optimized performance. I am well-versed in implementing **biometric authentication** and managing notifications using **Firebase Cloud Messaging** and **APNs**. Committed to software excellence, I adopt design patterns such as **MVVM**, **VIPER**, and **Clean Architecture** to enhance code maintainability and scalability. Alongside technical capabilities, my strong background in system architecture, frontend development, and quality assurance with **XCTest** positions me to deliver innovative and reliable iOS solutions that meet and exceed business objectives.
